subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jodie Meeks broke Kentucky star Dan Issel’s 39-year-old record of 53 points with a 54-point performance and the highest scoring game in the history of Kentucky basketball on Wednesday.
snippet: Jodie Meeks broke Kentucky star Dan Issel’s 39-year-old record of 53 points with a 54-point performance and the highest scoring game in the history of Kentucky basketball on Wednesday.
